name: Project Tanks
description:
Warning! This game requires at least one gamepad. Project TANKS A Szymon Świędrych game

Project Tanks is a 3D, isometric local multi-player shooter, highly inspired by the  Battle City.

See controls in pause menu. (ESCAPE or Start Button on Gamepad)
